content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #139

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Add names and captions for all tables/examples, and update references in the text

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: All sections
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Add names and captions for all tables/examples, and update references in the text

Comment: Add names and captions for all tables/examples, and update references in the text (e.g. Table 3 - Event json content).

This allows a better way to refer the table in a sentence.

E.g. Instead of "A json object describing the event. See below."it could be used "A json object describing the event. See Table 3.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #139

isaacvetter commented on Issue #139:

Proposed Resolution: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Resolution comment: Will add caption and names to all tables and example where name/caption can be more meaningful than the suggested example of "Table 3".

wmaethner commented on Issue #139:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

wmaethner commented on Issue #139:

Duplicate of issue #241 and fixed in #263

wmaethner closed Issue #139:
